KapliSota.com   : hi@KapliSota.com www.KapliSota.com Social media: @kaplisota ===============================   Big collection of Christian resources; sermons, music, audio books, and much more.   This app is made by KapliSota.com for your spiritual edification.  The purpose of our ministry is to develop a thirst for God and the Bible in the hearts of all people. We believe that this is possible when we constantly nourish our souls with the living word of God and good spiritual food.  This app has many convenient options for those who always want to watch or listen to Christian...  - Sermons, - Audio books - Music - Radio, - Inspiring testimonies, - Stories, - Answers to questions - And much more....  You can download all of these resources to your phone and take them with you, even when you do not have an Internet connection.  HOW YOU CAN HELP ! - Pray for our ministry - Tell your friends about this app - Let us know how to improve this app - Write a Review about this app in the App store  May God richly bless you and your loved ones!
